name: Python
description: A versatile and easy-to-learn programming language known for its simplicity and a wide range of applications, including web development, data analysis, and artificial intelligence.

name: JavaScript
description: A powerful and flexible programming language primarily used for interactive and dynamic web development, with applications in both front-end and back-end development.

name: Java
description: A robust, platform-independent programming language widely used for building enterprise-level applications, Android apps, and server-side development.

name: C++
description: An extension of the C programming language, C++ is widely used for system programming, game development, and performance-critical applications.

name: Ruby
description: A dynamic and open-source programming language known for its simplicity and productivity, often used in web development with the Ruby on Rails framework.

name: PHP
description: A popular scripting language for server-side web development, widely used to build dynamic web pages and applications.

name: Swift
description: A modern programming language developed by Apple for building iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS applications with safety and performance in mind.

name: C#
description: A modern and versatile programming language developed by Microsoft, commonly used for game development, desktop applications, and enterprise software.

name: Go
description: An open-source programming language designed by Google, known for its simplicity, concurrency features, and efficiency in building scalable applications.

name: Kotlin
description: A statically typed programming language that is fully interoperable with Java, widely used for Android app development and backend server development.
